Sweden prosecutor statement on Nord Stream blasts due on WednesdayThe prosecutor leading Sweden's investigation into the Nord Stream gas pipeline blasts in the Baltic Sea in 2022 expects to make an announcement on the case on Wednesday, his office said on Tuesday. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:53:58 GMT MIQWPZT2P5IAJEJFTJAY62QDBU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/sweden-prosecutor-statement-nord-stream-blasts-due-wednesday-2024-02-06/Reuters世界欧洲
Kenyan cult leader charged with murder of 191 childrenKenyan cult leader Paul Mackenzie and 29 associates were charged on Tuesday with the murder of 191 children whose bodies were found among more than double that number buried in a forest. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:50:39 GMT LTRIET63EFMJPI2UR2HVKDCWZM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/kenyan-cult-leader-charged-with-murder-191-children-2024-02-06/Reuters世界非洲
Pakistan election 2024: What challenges will the new government be faced with?Pakistan will hold a national election on Thursday to elect a new government, with multiple crises plaguing the nuclear-armed, South Asian nation of 241 million. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:30:24 GMT X54HPAT54ZJQROVF6ADKI7OELQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/multiple-challenges-face-winner-pakistans-upcoming-general-election-2024-02-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pakistan election 2024: How does it work?Pakistan goes to the polls on Thursday in a widely watched national election that will lead to the formation of a new government to lead the crisis-ridden South Asian nation for the next five years. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:28:49 GMT XK6DEGUWWNJRZF2IEGZSA4GXBM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/how-do-national-elections-pakistan-work-2024-02-06/Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Kenyan cult leader Mackenzie charged with murder in children's deathsKenyan cult leader Paul Mackenzie and 29 associates were charged on Tuesday with the murder of 191 children whose bodies have been exhumed since last April from the Shakahola forest, a judge said. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:25:12 GMT W6E7P2MQVRICVGAYSOUGUHH254 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/kenyan-cult-leader-mackenzie-charged-with-murder-childrens-deaths-2024-02-06/Reuters世界非洲
Kremlin declines comment on alleged visit of Tucker Carlson to Russian presidential administrationThe Kremlin, asked on Tuesday whether U.S. journalist Tucker Carlson had visited the Russian presidential administration in Moscow this week, declined to comment. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:12:15 GMT 5BSWTWBXAFIRBKQCO5K3EKRH7A https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-declines-comment-alleged-visit-tucker-carlson-Russian-presidential-2024-02-06/Reuters世界
Israel presses onslaught in Gaza's Khan Younis as US pursues ceasefire questIsraeli forces killed at least 14 Palestinians in airstrikes as they pressed their onslaught in Gaza's main southern city Khan Younis on Tuesday, while the top U.S. diplomat pursued a quest to broker a ceasefire in the four-month-old war. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 10:02:31 GMT OXH7BQYAN5IPPITTRLVMID4Z3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-presses-onslaught-gazas-khan-younis-us-pursues-ceasefire-quest-2024-02-06/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Humeyra Pamuk, Bassam Masoud世界中东
Ukraine's Donetsk region pounded by up to 2,500 Russian strikes daily - governorRussia is firing between 1,500 and 2,500 shells and rockets at Ukraine's war-ravaged Donetsk region every day and is targeting critical infrastructure to make it harder for people to remain there in winter, its governor told Reuters. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 09:50:32 GMT RQHF7Q4RENOQHOTEFESNZ7T47A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-donetsk-region-pounded-by-up-2500- Russian-strikes-daily-governor-2024-02-06/Max Hunder世界欧洲
Spanish farmers blockade roads, joining EU peers' protestsSpanish farmers blocked traffic on some of the country's main highways on Tuesday, joining colleagues in other European countries protesting against high costs, bureaucracy and competition from non-EU nations. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 09:27:40 GMT ZDV6QX2VUBJZXKTKBQOFFMQNKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-farmers-blockade-roads-joining-eu-peers-protests-2024-02-06/Reuters世界欧洲
Kazakh president names chief of staff Bektenov new PMKazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev named his chief of staff, Olzhas Bektenov, prime minister on Tuesday, quickly securing approval from parliament which is dominated by the ruling Amanat party. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 09:25:17 GMT 26KZT2O4QFI45EVHNABS2IZDCA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/kazakh-president-names-chief-staff-bektenov-new-pm-2024-02-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Colombia and ELN rebels extend ceasefire by six monthsColombia's government and National Liberation Army (ELN) rebels have agreed to extend their bilateral ceasefire by another six months, a statement released by both groups said. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 08:55:32 GMT JSIQJMJDLJJNPN6NXLPDGMLVLM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-eln-rebels-extend-ceasefire-by-six-months-2024-02-06/Reuters世界美洲
